awd_titl_txt: RUI: Dimuon and Associated Particle Production in Hadronic  Collisions
awd_abstract_narration: One faculty member together with undergraduate students                    will collaborate with others on research in elementary particle                 physics.  Experiment E672 at Fermilab has as its goal to test                   the predictions of the currently favored theory of the strong                   interactions, quantum chromodynamics, by studying the reaction                  products emerging from collisions between the basic                             constituents of matter, quarks and gluons.  In addition to                      particle physics, the project offers the opportunity to                         establish a research program  at a predominantly undergraduate                  institution and enable students to gain experience in forefront                 research.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
